recipe.ingredients:
2 Tortilla's
Handfull of cheese
4 Turkey/Ham slices
recipe.instructions:
1.Put Tortilla on plate
2.Put Turkey/Ham slices on tortilla
3.Put Cheese on meat
4.Cover in second tortilla
5.Put in Quesadilla Maker for 5 mins
6.Take out and slice into slices
recipe.title: Calvino's Fabulous Quesadilla
